duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service support to customers in areas including billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, and discounts.
Act as a direct line to customers, proactively sharing knowledge and providing a positive customer experience.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve policy and account-related questions from internal and external customers through various mediums.
Stay current with relevant products and support the organization's overall strategy.
Use technology and learning resources to deliver efficient problem resolution and reduce customer effort.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred.
